channel.title: Something I wrote
channel.description:
I've written things before, but nothing like this. We have this thing called SRT? Student Resource time. (pseudonyms: homeroom, break, study hall) Anyways, I had nothing to do so I started thinking of things, which lead to writing some things, which lead to this. I don't want you to just read it as much as understand it. If you think you know the meaning behind it, say it. If you have questions about anything specific, ask and I'll explain. What I want most of all is someone to understand what I write, because everyone I show only compliments or criticizes me. Anyways, here it is:
[center][b]Crazy until you're 32 times 2, wait that's 64. Beatles knocking on your front door, Dylan knocking on the back, attack opportunity like there's only one chance. What's a song with no dance? Our era, a man climbing on hills like he's lost-- Syds Barretts mind zone forever perfect like a metronome but so far from home. Timothy Leary had a theory, "All weary, none aware." fear in the air, no truth but scare tactics. It's the magic that comes through our TVs. Repeat the 60's please one more time for me, I missed the part where art was love, when dreams were white, new seeds and doves. Revolution kept it's title, because like a circle we're back to the beginning and still have our eyes closed. What's peace without destruction, what's hating without loving, what's good without bad but an hour glass with no sand. No one without the other, they must exist together; however much better you see one of the two. True blue is not blue but a shade of gray, new moon brings good news then fades away. Ignorance is bliss, reminisce past tense, pointless unchangeable, unfair but that's the way it goes. Everything you say means nothing unless it's heard, sad thing today is words are only words. And everything that's heard means nothing unless respected, my name could be an angels curse but that doesn't mean it's blessed. The ecstasy can get the best of me, but what matters is what's left of me. Rest my knees, I've been on my feet forever it seems, and like the trees I'm holding the whole world up above me. Harmony is hard to see because it's just the beginning to a bad ending. What's broke is broken and gone to me. No chance without a token we're in the open sea. Free but alone without support, already gone and can't abort. But why leave discovery. Trees cry and so do I, instead of one life I wish I had 9.[/b][/center]
Discuss? Hopefully you're not all oblivious.

item.title: Something I wrote
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:36, topic:306956”]I was talking to you, and also I would agree with Fat Cookies guess, as it was close enough to my own one. Have you written any other works like this?[/quote]Small things like:

Me:

creativity is a measure of how well you know your surroundings. your surroundings is a measure of how well you pay attention to them. lack of creativity, is a lack of attention to what is really going on in the world.

And

They fade away as well as the past into our now So make now last. Set your now so you can remember because when now is over, the past is forever.

I have more but cba to post.

lesterknome:

Lester knome is Ignored

[quote=“lesterknome, post:26, topic:306956”] what is up when down isn't down, it's just not up? [/quote]It’s poetic nonsense: “Whats a gun without bullets, but a weapon without a purpose? But all weapons have a purpose, don’t they?”

Read full topic

item.title: Something I wrote
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:31, topic:306956”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=403126.msg2986365#msg2986365 date=1255016041]
This is much easier on the eyes since I view this as a poem.
Meaning = NOSTAGIA!
[/quote]Whichever way you read it is fine with me as long as you understand it. Nostalgia could be an outcome, but not my intention. I do agree it’s an emotion that I express within what I wrote, but not what I wanted the message to be.

[quote author=Si Force link=topic=403126.msg2986470#msg2986470 date=1255025879]
I would have one question for you, do you even know what this all means? I could take 2-3 guesses at the meaning of it myself, although they may not be correct.
[/quote]Are you talking to Fat Cookies, or me? Because Fat Cookies was closer than anyone here. And if you’re talking to me, a lot of these things are symbolic and all have a purpose. I put everything in here for a reason, nothing in here doesn’t serve a purpose.

@everyone flaming–

You’re contradicting the epitome of this thread. Please leave, your hypocritical replies are completely ironic if you actually read this.[/quote]

Lester knome is Ignored

Read full topic

item.title: Something I wrote
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“The Soul, post:35, topic:306956”][quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=403126.msg2987667#msg2987667 date=1255116366]

The best poem and deepest poem I’ve ever read… even though I don’t know the meaning.

poems don’t have to mean anything, they are made from imignation, peoms are niether bad or good, to a good peot.

No, poems almost always have a meaning. It just depends on whether or not you’re deep enough to find it. Poems could also be an alegory (or symbolic), and you’re not sure what the author really means.

All poems have multiple meanings, depending on how one interprets it. The author’s intended meaning may not be the same as yours. There is no true meaning, only your interpretation.

Also, allegory*.
[/quote]

There is a true meaning…the author’s intention. However the reader may interpret the poem differently, but it doesn’t change what the author was trying to get at.[/quote]
All pieces of literature have a prominent interpretation; the one the author is trying to get at. That doesn’t mean it’s the true meaning of the piece though. Each person perceives the piece in a different way, so there are infinite meanings. You’re just speaking behalf of the author. If you’re talking about a ‘true meaning’, there is none.

‘There are no facts, only interpretations.’ - Nietzsche

Read full topic

item.title: Something I wrote
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[center][b]Crazy until you're 32 times 2, wait that's 64. Beatles knocking on your front door, Dylan knocking on the back, attack opportunity like there's only one chance. What's a song with no dance?

Our era, a man climbing on hills like he’s lost-- Syds Barretts mind zone forever perfect like a metronome but so far from home.
Timothy Leary had a theory,
“All weary, none aware.” fear in the air,
no truth but scare tactics.
It’s the magic that comes through our TVs.
Repeat the 60’s please one more time for me,
I missed the part where art was love,
when dreams were white, new seeds and doves.
Revolution kept it’s title,
because like a circle we’re back to the beginning and still have our eyes closed. What’s peace without destruction,
what’s hating without loving, what’s good without bad but an hour glass with no sand.
No one without the other,
they must exist together;
however much better you see one of the two.
True blue is not blue but a shade of gray,
new moon brings good news then fades away.
Ignorance is bliss, reminisce past tense,
pointless unchangeable, unfair but that’s the way it goes.
Everything you say means nothing unless it’s heard,
sad thing today is words are only words.
And everything that’s heard means nothing unless respected,
my name could be an angels curse but that doesn’t mean it’s blessed.
The ecstasy can get the best of me,
but what matters is what’s left of me.
Rest my knees,
I’ve been on my feet forever it seems,
and like the trees I’m holding the whole world up above me.
Harmony is hard to see because it’s just the beginning to a bad ending.
What’s broke is broken and gone to me.
No chance without a token we’re in the open sea.
Free but alone without support,
already gone and can’t abort.
But why leave discovery.
Trees cry and so do I, instead of one life I wish I had 9.[/b][/center]

This is much easier on the eyes since I view this as a poem.
Meaning = NOSTAGIA!

Read full topic

item.title: Something I wrote
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:17, topic:306956”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=403126.msg2986031#msg2986031 date=1254972668]

[quote author=The Reaper X link=topic=403126.msg2986030#msg2986030 date=1254972587]

Today, the people that run the world only care about being at the top, and having everything more than what the rest of us have. Now that the powerful people don’t have to do anything they keep marching on to make there life even more enjoyable because they constantly need to be self indulged into there own ego and charisma, and they take from the people that have nothing in an effort to become a god. Most the world is blind and that’s what makes them happy, and the only people that know what’s going on are either the people that can’t do anything to change anything or the people that are also ego-whores.
[/quote]Thank you.

That’s just how I view what the world has become. I could write a book over the subject.
[/quote]I was thinking about it. This gave me a spark sort of, of inspiration.[/quote]

I have actually been writing something up in OpenOffice for a while now, but I don’t think I will release it unless it get’s really in detail.

Read full topic
